column1: 1594316797192601600,1594316797192601600@TimRasinski1 @AbbyTeachesDSM @ksirach @ehanford She was asked to do repeated readings & brought home little “decodables” that were neither decodable nor matched up to any kind of phonics lesson from the classroom. So, I would say that didn’t help. She just struggled, and is still in therapy for the trauma. t_end
